ygData.subject: Re: Worth it to practice 1h blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: The only reason that I can see practicing 1h blunt is if you plan on getting a Staff of Writhing.
ygData.messageBody:
The only reason that I can see practicing 1h blunt is if you plan on getting
a Staff of Writhing.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Murawski [SMTP:scott@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 9:09 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Worth it to practice 1h blunt?
>
> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>
> I didn't get a 1h blunt weapon (cracked staff) until I turned like level
> 10, but I didn't practice it much.
> I think my skill is (1).
>
> My piercing and 2h blunt are good though.
>
> Should I try hard and increase it?
> You can only increase mele skills on blues or above, right?
>
> Thanks
> Azboklin the enchanter
>
